faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: Can I use Cafelab if I'm just a barista and don't own a coffee shop?
faq.a1: Of course! Cafelab adapts to both individual baristas and full coffee shops.
faq.q2: What's the difference between the plans?
faq.a2: The plans differ in the number of users, access to advanced features, and analysis modules.
faq.q3: Is the app available for mobile?
faq.a3: Yes, Cafelab works perfectly from a mobile browser. The native app is under development.
faq.a4: You can write to us at contacto@cafemetrix.com or use the contact form.
